name: gradle console
tagline: Easily interact with your Groovy and Java applications
body: This plugin allows you to easily interact with your Groovy and Java applications. Just run gradle console and you will get a console window with all your runtime dependencies loaded for you. This is useful in case you need to interact your project dependencies or your source code in a fast and flexible way. ## Instalation Just add the following snippet of code to your build.gradle file ```groovy buildscript { repositories { mavenCentral() } dependencies { classpath group: 'carlosgsouza', name: 'gradle-console', version: '1.0' } } ``` ## Usage Invoke the console task using gradle ``` gradle console ``` ## About this project This is just the first version of this plugin and we are couting on your feedback to make it better! Don't hesitate to send us an e-mail, create an issue on GitHub or, even better, submit a pull request.
